sentence.Network_en: The extraction and the purification techniques of procyanidins from grape ( Vitis davidii Foex ) seed were studied.
sentence.Network_cn: 对刺葡萄籽中原花青素的提取和 纯化工艺 做了初步的研究.

list.abs: the mutagenic effects of colchicine on germinating seed of vitis davidii foex秋水仙素对刺葡萄萌发种子诱变的影响
